roles.name: Admin
roles.description: System Administrator with full access to all features and data
permissions: Assign users to companies (single and multiple)
View all employees across all companies

roles.name: Manager
roles.description: Company Manager with access to their company's data and employees
permissions: View employees in their company only
View employee details in their company
View employees by department in their company
roles.restrictions: Limited to their assigned company's data only
roles.defaultUser: None - must be assigned by Admin

roles.name: Employee
roles.description: Regular employee with basic access to their own information
roles.restrictions: Can only access their own data
roles.defaultUser: None - must be assigned by Admin

roles.name: IT
roles.description: IT personnel with technical system access and user management capabilities
permissions: View all users across all companies
Access all API endpoints for technical operations
roles.restrictions: Cannot delete companies or modify financial data
roles.defaultUser: None - must be assigned by Admin

roles.name: HR
roles.description: HR personnel with employee management and company-wide HR operations access
permissions: View all employees in their company
roles.restrictions: Limited to their assigned company's HR data only
roles.defaultUser: None - must be assigned by Admin

roles.name: HR Manager
roles.description: Senior HR personnel with advanced HR management capabilities and strategic oversight
permissions: Manage HR staff and assign HR roles
Access strategic HR analytics and insights
Approve major HR decisions and changes
roles.restrictions: Limited to their assigned company, cannot manage IT or Admin users
roles.defaultUser: None - must be assigned by Admin

Admin.description: Highest level - can manage all other roles

IT.description: Technical level - can manage users but not other IT or HR Managers

HR Manager.description: Senior HR level - can manage HR staff and employees in their company

Manager.description: Mid level - can manage employees in their company

HR.description: HR level - can manage employee HR data in their company

Employee.description: Base level - can only manage their own data

userManagement.Admin: Can create, update, delete all users
userManagement.IT: Can create, update, deactivate users (no delete)
userManagement.HR Manager: Can manage HR staff and employees in their company
userManagement.Manager: Can view employees in their company
userManagement.HR: Can create and update employee profiles in their company
userManagement.Employee: Can only view their own profile
